QuestData.Title: Champion of the Tournament
QuestData.Description: With this tournament we grow ever closer to our final confrontation with the Lich King.$B$B$n, fight with valor and honor. Every fighter here has gathered for the common good.$B$BTogether, we will stop Arthas!
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: You bring me great hope for the success of this campaign.
QuestData.LogDescription: Highlord Tirion Fordring has tasked you with the completion of the Trial of the Champion.
QuestData.RewardText: I am honored to stand in the presence of such a fierce warrior.$B$BYou have brought honor to yourself and to your people, $n!
